Topa’thupiak bangin Moses zong gamta hi. Mihonte khempeuh’ muhin Hor Mual tungah amaute paito uh hi.Topa’
Moses in Aaron’ puante suah khiatsakin a tapa Eleazar silhsak a, tua mual dawnah Aaron a si hi. Tua ciangin mual tung panin Moses le Eleazar paisuk uh hi.
Aaron si hi, ci-in mihonte khempeuh in a theih uh ciangin, Aaron’ hangin Israel mi khempeuh ni sawmthum sung a kap uh hi.
Kanaan mi, Negeb gam a teeng Arad gam kumpipa in Atharim lam tawnin Israel mite hong paina thu a zak ciangin amah in Israel-te do-in, amaute kimkhat salin a man hi.
Tua ciangin Israel-te inTopa’tungah kiciamna khat bawl uh a, “Ka khut sung uhah hih mite nong piak nakleh kote in amau’ khuapite ka susia mang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa’
Topain zong Israel-te’ cihna mangin Kanaan mite a pia hi. Israel-te in amau le a khuapite uh susia mang ahih ciangin tua mun pen Hormah kici hi.Topa
Hor Mual panin amaute ding khia-in Edom gam kiimah a pai dingin San Tuipi lamah pai uh a, lamkalah mite lungkia uh hi.
Mite in Pasian le Moses gensia uh a, “Bang hangin sehnel gamah a si dingin Egypt panin kote hong pai khiatpih to na hi hiam? An le tui om lo a, bangmah a man lo hih an ka kih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua cianginTopain mite’ lakah gul guphate khah a, tuate in mite tu-in Israel mi tampi a si hi.Topa

Moses kiangah mite hong pai-in, “Topale nang hong gensia-in kampau kha ka hih manun ka khial uh hi. Kote’ kiang panin gulte a lakkhiat nadinginTopa’tungah thum in,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite adingin Moses in thumsak hi.TopaTopa’
Topain Moses kiangah, “Gul gupha tawh a kibang sumngo gul khat bawl inla, khuam khat tungah khai in. Gul in a tuk mi peuhmah in tua gul a et ciangin hing ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in sumngo gul khat bawl a, khuam khat tungah a khai hi. Gul in mi khatpeuh a tuk leh amah in tua sumngo gul enin hing pah hi.
Israel mite ding khia uh a, Oboth munah giahphual sat uh hi.
Oboth panin ding khia uh a, nisuahna lam, Iyeabarim munah giahphual sat uh hi.
Tua lai panin ding khia uh a, Zered Kuam-ah giahphual sat uh hi.

Tua lai panin ding khia uh a, Amor mite’ gamgi panin a hong kikhungsuk gamlak a om Arnon gun galkhat ah giahphual sat uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Arnon gun pen Moab le Amor mite’ kikalah Moab-te’ gamgi ahi hi.
Tua ahih maninTopa’Gal Laibusungah,Topa’Gal Laibu“Sufa gam a Vuahep khua,le Arnon gun kuamte,
le Ar khua ciang ban sukin,Moab gamgi lamah a paisuk kuam”kici hi.
Tua lai panin Beer munah pai uh hi. Tua mun penTopain Moses kiangah, “Mite kaikhawm in; amaute tui ka pia ding hi,” a cihna tuikhuk ahi hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Israel mite in hih la sa uh hi:“Tuikhuk aw, phul in!La kong sak ding uh hi.
Kumpi ciangkhut leamau’ ciangkhutte tawhmite’ uliante in a tawh,kumpi tate in a tawh tuikhuk aw,”a ci uh hi.Gamlak panin amaute Mattanah munah pai uh a,
Mattanah panin Nahaliel, Nahaliel panin Bamoth,
Bamoth panin sehnel gam a kimuhsuk theihna Pisgah mual kiang nai, Moab gam sunga kuam khatah tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel-te in Amor kumpipa Sihon kiangah kamtaite sawl uh a,

“Na gam hong kantansak in. Lo ahi a, leenggui lo ah ahi zongin ka pial kei ding uh hi. Tuikhuk tuite kong neksak kei ding uh a, na gam ka khen khit mateng uh Kumpipa’ Lamlian tawnin ka pai ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Sihon in Israel mite ama gam kantansak lo hi. Amah in a mite khempeuh kaikhawmin, Israel-te a do dingin gamlakah pai-in Jahaz mun tunga, Israel-te a do hi.
Israel-te in namsau tawh amah le a mite tampi thatin, Arnon gun panin Jabbok lui, Ammon mite kiang dong bek a gam laksak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Ammon mite’ gamgi nawksuak zo lo uh hi.
Israel-te in a khuapite khempeuh la-in, Heshbon gam sunga Amor mite’ khuapi khempeuh le khuaneu khempeuh ah a teeng uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Heshbon pen, nidangin Moab kumpipa simin a khut sung panin Arnon gun ciang dong a gam khempeuh a laksak, Amor mite’ kumpipa Sihon’ khuapi ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin la a sa pawlte in,“Heshbon-ah hong pai un.Lamkik unla, Sihon’ khuapi kipsak un.
Heshbon paninmei piang khia a,Sihon’ khuapi paninmeikuang piang khia hi.Moab mite’ khuapi Ar,Arnon mual sang a uktekaangtum hi.
Moab! Gimna na ngah hi.Khemosh mite!Na mangthang uh hi.Amah in a tapate galtai-in,a tanute galmatin,Amor kumpipa Sihon adinginhong bawl hi.
Tua ahih cianginamau’ suanlekhakteHeshbon pan Dibon ciang dongsi uh a,mei in Medeba ciang donga bat mateng ka siasak uh hi,”ci-in sa uh hi.
Tua bangin Amor mite’ gam sungah Israel-te teeng uh hi.
Moses in Jazer khua thu a kansim dingin mi a sawl hi. Amaute in a khuaneute la-in tua lai-a om Amor mite suan khia uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kihei-in Bashan lamah paito uh hi. Bashan kumpipa Og le a mite khempeuh Edrei-ah amaute a do dingin hong kuan uh hi.

Ahih hanginTopain Moses kiangah, “Amah kihta kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah le a mite khempeuh le a leitang, nomau khut sungah kong pia khin hi. Heshbon-ah a teeng Amor kumpipa Sihon na bawl bangun amah na bawl ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin khat beek a nungta a om nawn lo dingin amaute in amah le a tapate le a mite khempeuh that uh a, amaute in ama gam a luah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite ding khia uh a, Jerikho gei Jordan galkhat Moab gam zanglei-ah giahphual a sat uh hi.
Israel-te in Amor mite tungah a bawlna khempeuh Zippor’ tapa Balak in mu hi.
Amaute tam mahmah uh ahih manin Moab mite in tua mite kihta uh a, Israel mite kihtakna hangin Moab mite liing gawp uh hi.

Moab mite in Midian upate kiangah, “Bawngtal in gamlak lopate a liah bangin hih mite in i kiima om mi khempeuh liaktum mang ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Zippor’ tapa Balak, tua hun laitak a Moab kumpipa in

Amaw mite’ gam Gun gei Pethor-ah a om Beor’ tapa Balaam kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “En in, Egypt panin mihon khat hong pai khia hi. Amaute, lei maitang teng dim khin uh a, keima galkhat ah amaute om uh hi.

Tu-in hong pai inla, amaute hat lua uh ahih manin hih mite hong samsiatsak in. Tua hileh amaute zo-in hih gam panin ka hawl khia zo kha ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thupha na piak mi in thupha ngahin, na samsiat mi in siatna a ngahna ka thei hi,” cisak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moab upate le Midian upate aisanna man ding tawh kuan khia-in Balaam kiangah pai uh a, Balak’ thu ama kiangah sung uh hi.
Balaam in amaute kiangah, “Tuzan hih lai-ah giak phot un.Topain kei tungah hong gen bangin note tungah kong genkik ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Moab uliante Balaam tawh a om uh hi.Topa
Balaam kiangah Pasian hong pai-in, “Nang tawh a om hih mite kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Balaam in Pasian kiangah, “Zippor’ tapa Balak, Moab kumpipa in kei kiangah mi hong sawlin,

‘En in, Egypt panin mihon khat hong pai khia a, lei maitang teng dim uh hi. Tu-in hong pai inla, amaute hong samsiatsak in. Tua hileh amaute do-in ka hawl khia zo kha ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Pasian in Balaam kiangah, “Amaute na zui kei ding hi. Tua mite thupha a kipia ahih manin na samsia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Balaam tho-in Balak’ uliante kiangah, “Na gam uhah ciah un; bang hang hiam cih lehTopain note kong zuih ding hong phal lo hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Moab uliante dingin Balak kiangah ciah uh a, “Balaam in kote hong zui nuam lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Balak in amaute sangin a tam zaw le a zahtakhuai zaw uliante khatvei sawlkik hi.
Amaute zong Balaam kiangah pai-in ama kiangah, “Zippor’ tapa Balak in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Kei kiangah nong pai nading bangmah kikol-awksak kei in;
bang hang hiam cih leh minphatna lianpi nang kong pia dinga, kei’ tunga nong gen peuhpeuh ka hih ding hi. Hong pai inla, hih mite hong samsiatsak in,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.

Ahih hangin Balaam in Balak’ nasemte kiangah, “Balak in kham le ngun tawh a kidim ama inn hong pia ding hitaleh zong,Topaka Pasian’ thupiakna banah a tam zaw hitaleh a tawm zaw hitaleh bangmah ka hih thei kei hi.Topa
Tu-in kong thum hi;Topain kei tungah bang hong ci lai ding hiam cih ka theih nadingin tuzan zong hih lai-ah giak phot un,” ci-in a dawng hi.Topa
Tua zanin Balaam kiangah Pasian hong pai-in, “Nangmah a sam dingin mite hong pai ahihleh, tho inla amaute zui in. Ahih hangin nang kong sawl teng bek na hih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Balaam tho-in a la tutphah vawhin Moab uliante a zui hi.
Ahih hangin amah pai ahih manin Pasian heh a, amah a khaktan dinginTopa’vantungmi in lampi-ah na pang hi. Tu-in a la tungah amah tuang a, a nasemte nih in zong a zui uh hi.Topa’
Topa’vantungmi in a khut sungah namsau dawhsa tawi-in lampi-ah a ding, a la in mu ahih manin lampi panin pialin gamlakah a pai hi. Balaam in lampi-ah a paikik nadingin a la a sat hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin leenggui lo kikal, a pang tuakah phung a omna lam kawcikah vantungmi na ding leuleu hi.
La inTopa’vantungmi a muh ciangin phung phu a, phungah Balaam’ khe nengcip ahih ciangin amah in a la satkik hi.Topa’
Tua cianginTopa’vantungmi na ma pai-in, taklamah ahi a, veilamah ahi zongin kihei theih nading a om lohna mun kawcik khatah na ding leuleu hi.Topa’
La inTopa’vantungmi a muh ciangin Balaam’ nuai-ah lumsuk hi. Balaam heh mahmah a, a ciangkhut tawh a la a sat hi.Topa’
Tua cianginTopainla pau theisak a, la in Balaam kiangah, “Thumvei dong nong sat nadingin nang bang hong cih ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.Topa
Balaam in a la kiangah, “Nang in kei nong mawlpihna hang ahi hi. Ka khutah namsau a tawi hi leng ka ut hi. Tua hileh nang kong that khin ding hi,” a ci hi.
La in Balaam’ kiangah, “Na khantawnin tuni ciang dong na tuanna na la hi lo ka hi hiam? Hih bangin nang hong hih ngei ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Nong hih ngei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua cianginTopain Balaam’ mitte honsak a, a khut sungah namsau dawhsa tawhTopa’vantungmi lampi-ah a ding mu ahih manin a lu kunin a boksuk hi.TopaTopa’
Topa’vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin na la thumvei dong sat na hi hiam? En in, hih na khualzinna-ah lungkim lo ka hih manin nang hong pang dingin kong kuan khia hi.Topa’
La in kei hong mu-in thumvei dong hong peel hi. Hong peel kei leh, tu mahmahin nang hong that khinin na la ka hingsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Balaam inTopa’vantungmi kiangah, “Kei hong pangin lampi-ah na dinlam thei lo ka hih manin ka khial hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka khualzinna hoihsa lo na hih leh ka ciahkik ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topa’vantungmi in Balaam kiangah, “Mite zui in; ahih hangin nang kong sawl teng bek na gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Balaam in Balak’ uliante a zuisuak hi.Topa’
Balaam’ hong paina thu Balak in a zak ciangin, Arnon gun gamgi-in a kizatna dunga om, Moab gamgi gei-a om Ar khuapi ciangah amah a dawn dingin a pai khia hi.
Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Nang hong sam ding mi hong sawl hi lo ka hi hiam? Bang hangin hong pai lo na hi hiam? Nang hong liansak lah ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Balaam in Balak kiangah, “En in, na kiang hong tung ing! Thu khatpeuh ka gen theih nading vangliatna nei ka hi hiam? Pasian in hong sawl thu bek ka gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Balaam in Balak zui a, Kiriathhuzoth khua-ah a tung uh hi.
Balak in bawngtalte le tuute tawh biakna pia-in Balaam le amah tawh a om uliante kiangah a puak hi.
A zing ciangin Balak in Balaam samin Bamothbaal munah paipihto hi. Tua lai panin amah in Israel mi a madawk pente galmuh thei hi.
Tua ciangin Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Hih lai-ah kei adingin biakna tau sagih hong bawlsak inla, kei adingin bawngtal sagih le tuutal sagih hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Balaam’ gen bangin Balak gamta a, Balak le Balaam in biakna tau simah bawngtal khat le tuutal khat ciat a pia uh hi.

Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Na meihal biakna kiangah na ding in; kei ka va pai ding hi. Kei hong dawn dinginTopahong pai kha ding hi. Amah in kei hong lah khempeuh nang kiangah kong gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a sang mual dawn pawn khatah amah a paito hi.Topa
Pasian in Balaam na dawn hi. Balaam in ama kiangah, “Biakna tau sagih ka bawl khin a, biakna tau simah bawngtal khat le tuutal khat ciat ka pia hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Balaam kiangah thu gen a, “Balak kiangah ciahkikin hih bangin na gen ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Balak kiangah a ciahkik ciangin amah le Moab uliante khempeuh ama meihal biakna gei-ah na ding uh hi.
Balaam in a thugen ding teng genin:“Aram panin Balak in kei hong paipih a,nisuahna mualte panin Moab kumpipa inkei hong paipih hi:‘Hong pai in,Israel mite mawhsak in!’hong ci hi.
Pasian’ samsiat loh mitebangci samsiat ding ka hi hiam?Topa’mawhsak loh miteTopa’bangci mawhsak ding ka hi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih lehmual dawn panin amaute ka mu a,mual neute panin amauteka en hi.En in, a tangten mite,minamte lakah a kihel lote!
Leivui zahin a tam Jakob mite,kua in a mal sim zo dinga,Israel mi phazaha mal sim zo ding ahi hiam?Mi thuman pa’ sihna banginhong sisak inla,ka mailam thu ama a’ bang hisak in!”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Kei bang hong cih na hi hiam? Ka galte a samsia dingin nang kong sam a, ahi zongin amaute bangmah cih loin, amaute thupha na pia zawsop hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Topain ka gen dingin hong sawl thu, don lo ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.Topa

Tua ciangin Balak in ama kiangah, “Amaute na muh theih nading mun dangah kei hong zui in. Amaute a madawk teng bek na mu dinga, a vekpi-in na mu kei ding hi. Tua ciangin tua lai panin amaute nong samsiatsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Zofim gamlak, Pisgah mual dawnah amah paipihin, biakna tau sagih bawl a, biakna tau simah bawngtal khat le tuutal khat ciat a pia hi.
Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Hua lamahTopatawh ka va kituah kalun na meihal biakna gei hih lai-ah na ding in,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Balaam na dawnin ama kiangah, “Balak kiangah ciahkikin hih bangin thu na gen ding hi” a ci hi.Topa
Balak kiangah a paikik ciangin a meihal biakna gei-ah amah na dinga, Moab uliante tawh na om uh hi. Balak in ama kiangah, “Topain bang hong gen ahi hiam?” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Balaam in a thugen ding teng genin:“Balak aw, ka thugen ding za in.Zippor’ tapa aw, ka thu ngai in:
A zuau dingin Pasian pen mihing hi lo a,a kisik dingin mihing’ tapa hi lo hi.Amah in gen khin hi;a gen bangin hih lo ding ahi hiam?Amah in ci khin hi;a cih bangin tungsak lo ding ahi hiam?
En in, thupha piak ding thuka ngah hi.Amah in thupha pia khin a,ke’n ka kheelkik thei kei hi.
Amah in Jakob mite tungahmawhna mu lo a,Israel mite tungahgamtatsiatna mu lo hi.Topaamau’ Pasian,Topaamaute tawh om a,kumpipa phatna awgingamaute’ lakah om hi.
Pasian in Egypt paninamaute pai khiatpih a,amaute in gamsial tha banghatna nei uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Jakob mitea kibum nading om lo a,Israel mite’ langkhat ahaisan ding om lo hi.Tu-in Israel-te tawh kisai-in,‘Pasian’ sepna en un,’ kici ding hi.
En un, hua mite!Humpinelkai bangin thoto a,humpinelkai bangin kaangto hi.A an a nek mateng,amaute’ si a dawn mateng,lumsuk lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Amaute samsia peuhmah kei inla, thupha zong pia peuhmah kei in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Topa’cih khempeuh keimah in ka hih ding hi,’ hong ci hi lo ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng hi.Topa’
Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Tu-in hong pai in; mun dangah kong paipih ding hi. Tua lai panin amaute nong samsiatsak nading Pasian in hong lungkimpih kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Balak in sehnel gam a kimuh sukna Peor mual dawnah Balaam paipih hi.
Tua ciangin Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Hih lai-ah kei adingin biakna tau sagih hong bawlsak inla, bawngtal sagih le tuutal sagih hih lai-ah hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Balaam’ cih bangin Balak in hih a, biakna tau simah bawngtal khat le tuutal khat ciat a pia hi.
Israel-te thupha piak ding inTopalungkimsak ahihna Balaam in a muh ciangin, a hun dang a bangin kihilna lim a mu dingin pai lo a, a maitang gamlak lam ngat hi.Topa
Balaam khuadak a, a nam namin Israel-te in giahphual a sat a mu hi. Pasian’ Kha ama tungah hong tunga,
amah in a thugen ding teng genin:“Beor’ tapa Balaam’ thugen,a mit in khua a mu theimipa’ thugen,
Pasian’ thute a za,Vanglianpa’ maangmuhna a mu,maang mu napi-in a mit inkhua a mu thei mipa’ thugen:
Jakob mite aw, na puanbukte uhbangzahin hoih ahi hiam?Israel mite aw, na giahphual uhbangzahin hoih ahi hiam?
Saupi a kiphah kuamte tawhkibang a,gun gei-a om huante tawhkibang hi.Topain a suanTopaaloes paknamtui kungte tawhkibang a,tuipi gei-a om taamtak kungtetawh kibang hi.
A phelkhaite panin tui luangdinga,a khaici in tui tampi ngahin,a kumpipa uh,Agag sangin lian zaw dinga,ama kumpi gamkiliansak ding hi.

Pasian in Egypt gam paninamaute pai khiatpih a,gamsial bangin amaute thahat uh hi.Amaute in a gal uh ahiminam dangte su gawp ding uh a,amau’ guhte suzan gawp ding uh a,a thaltang uh tawhamaute kaplet ding uh hi.

Amaute bok a,humpinelkai pa banginlumsuk uh hi.Humpinelkaipi banginlumsuk uh hi.Kua in amautephong ngam ding ahi hiam?Note thupha hong piate inthupha ngah henla,note hong samsiate insamsiatna ngah tahen,”a ci hi.
Balaam’ tungah Balak heh mahmah a, amah in a khut le a khut a tuum hi. Balak in Balaam kiangah, “Ka galte a samsia dingin nang kong sam hi. En in, nang in amaute thumvei tak thupha na pia khinzo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na omna munah tai in. ‘Nang kong min liansak ding hi,’ ka hong ci hi. Ahih hangin na min liat nading paninTopain nang hong khaktan hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Balaam in Balak kiangah, “Kei kiangah nong sawl na kamtaite kiangah,

‘Balak in kham le ngun tawh a kidim ama inn hong pia ding hitaleh zong,Topa’thu banah keima thu-in a pha bawl ding ahi a, a sia bawl ding ahi zongin bangmah ka hih thei kei hi.Topa’gente bek keimah in ka gen ding hi,’ ci-in gen khin hi lo ka hi hiam?Topa’Topa’
“Tu-in en in, ka mipihte kiangah ka pai ding hi. Hong pai in; nidang ciangin hih mite in na mite’ tungah a bawl dingte kong theisak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a thugen ding teng genin,“Beor’ tapa Balaam’ thugen,a mit in khua a mu thei mipa’ thugen,
Pasian’ thute a za,Sang Pen pa’ thugen a thei,Vanglianpa’ maangmuhna a mu,maang mu napi-in a mit inkhua a mu thei mipa’ thugen in:

Amah ka mu hi; ahih hangintunai hun hi lo hi:Jakob sung pan aksi khat hongsuak khia dinga,Israel sung pankumpi ciangkhuthong piang ding hi.Tua in Moab thaltangsatkham dinga,Sheth’ suante khempeuhsu gawp ding hi.
Israel gualzo dinga,Edom mite kisuankhia dinga,a galte ahi Seir zong,kisuankhia ding hi.
Jakob tawh ukna na kisem dinga,khuapi sunga a suaktatekisusia ding!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Amalek mite enin, ama thugen ding teng genin,“Amalek, minamtelakah a masa pen hi a,ahih hangin a tawpna-ahsiatna a tuak ding hi,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Ken mite enin, ama thugen ding teng genin,“Na omna mun kho a,suangpi sungah na bu kibawl hi.
Ahih hangin Kain bei ding hi.Asher in galmatin nang bang tanveihong nei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in a thugen dinga omlai teng genin,“Ala! Pasian in hihte a hih cianginkua nungta zo ding ahi hiam?
Ahih hangin Kittim paninteembawte hong pai-inAsshur le Eber gimsak dinga,amah in zong siatna tuak ding hi,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Balaam dingin ama gamah ciahkik a, Balak zong a ciah hi.
Shittim-ah Israel mite a om laitakin Moab gam numeite tawh paktat ding kipan uh hi.
Hih numeite in amau’ pasian biakpiakna pawi-ah Israel mite sam uh a, amaute in a pawi an nekpihin, amau’ pasian-te’ mai-ah kun uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Peor-a Baal tawh Israel mite va kizomtawm hi. Israel mite tungahTopaheh mahmah a,Topa
Topain Moses kiangah, “Israel mite’ tung paninTopa’hehna a kihtakhuai a bei theih nadingin mite’ ukpite khempeuh man inla,Topa’mai-ah suntangin amaute khai in,” a ci hi.TopaTopa’Topa’
Moses in Israel thukhente kiangah, “Note khempeuh in Peor-a Baal tawh a va kizomtawm na mite khempeuh uh na that ciat ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Kikhopna bukkongah amaute kapin a om laitak, Moses’ muhna le Israel mihon buppi’ muhna-ah Israel mite khat hong pai-in, Midian numei khat ama innkuanpihte kiangah hong ciahpih hi.
Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar, Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in a muh ciangin dingin mihonte’ lak panin pai khia a, a khutah teipi khat tawi-in
Israel mipa inndei sungah zui a, Israel mipa le a numei, a numei’ pumpi pailetin a nihin sun khawm hi. Tua bangin Israel mite’ sung panin gimna dai hi.
Ahi zongin gimna tawh a si mite tul sawmnih le tulli ahi hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Siampi Aaron’ tapa Eleazar, Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in Israel mite tungah ka hehna damsakkik hi. Keimah in pammaih ka sak bangin amah in pammaihsa ahih ciangin pammaih ka sakna tawh Israel mite ka beisak kei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, ‘En in, ka thuciam ahi nopsakna, amah ka pia hi.

Ama tung le ama khit ah a suanlekhakte tungah tawntung siampi hihna thuciamna hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama Pasian ading amah in pammaih saksak a, Israel mite ading kilemna bawlsak hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Midian numei tawh a kithat khawm, Israel mi a kithat pa’ min pen Simeon mite sung panin a beh lutang Salu’ tapa Zimri ahi hi.
Midian numei a kithatnu’ min pen Midian innkuan sungah a beh lutang ahi Zur’ tanu Kozbi ahi hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Midian mite gimsak gawp inla, amaute vat gawp in;

bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a khelpilna uh tawh note hong gimsak gawp uh a, Peor tawh kisai thu le Peor’ hangin gimna ni-in a kithat, amau’ sanggamnu, Midian uliante’ tanu Kozbi thu-ah note hong khem uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua gimna khit ciangin
“Israel mihonte khempeuh kum sawmnih pan a tungsiah, a behbehin, Israel sung panin galdo dingin a kuan khia thei ding khempeuh sim in,” a ci hi.
Moses le siampi Eleazar in Jerikho nai, Jordan kiang, Moab zanglei-ah amaute’ tungah thu gen a,
Israel’ tacil Reuben hi a, Reuben’ tapate: Hanok pan Hanok behte ahi uh hi; Pallu pan Pallu behte ahi uh hi;
Hezron pan Hezron behte ahi uh hi; Karmi pan Karmi behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh pen Reuben minam ahi uh hi; amau mi tul sawmli le tulthum le zasagih le sawmthum pha hi.
Pallu’ tapa Eliab ahi hi.
Eliab’ tapate pen Nemuel, Dathan le Abiram ahi uh hi. Hih Dathan le Abiram pen, mihonte lak panin pawl a kai, amaute in
Mei in mihing zanih le sawmnga a kattum lai-in lei in a kam ka-in Korah tawh amaute valh tumin amau pawl teng si uh a, amaute pen hilhkholhna a suak uh hi.
Ahi zongin Korah’ tapate si lo uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Simeon minamte: Nemuel pan Nemuel behte ahi uh hi; Jamin pan Jamin behte ahi uh hi; Jakhin pan Jakhin behte ahi uh hi;
Zerah pan Zerah behte ahi uh hi; Shaul pan Shaul behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen Simeon minam hi uh a, mi tul sawmnih le tulnih le zanih ahi uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Gad minamte: Zefon pan Zefon behte ahi uh hi; Haggi pan Haggi behte ahi uh hi; Shuni pan Shuni behte ahi uh hi;
Ozni pan Ozni behte ahi uh hi; Eri pan Eri behte ahi uh hi;
Arod pan Arod behte ahi uh hi; Areli pan Areli behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen Gad minamte hi a, mi tul sawmli le zanga ahi hi.
Judah’ tapate pen Er le Onan hi a, Kanaan gamah Er le Onan si uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Judah minamte in: Shelah pan Shelah behte ahi uh hi; Perez pan Perez behte ahi uh hi; Zerah pan Zerah behte ahi uh hi.
Perez mite: Hezron pan Hezron behte ahi uh hi; Hamul pan Hamul behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen Judah minamte hi a, mi tul sawmsagih le tulguk le zanga ahi uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Issakhar minamte: Tola pan Tola behte ahi uh hi; Puvah pan Puvah behte ahi uh hi;
Jashub pan Jashub behte ahi uh hi; Shimron pan Shimron behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen Issakhar minamte hi a, mi tul sawmguk le tulli le zathum ahi uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Zebulun minamte: Sered pan Sered behte ahi uh hi; Elon pan Elon behte ahi uh hi; Jahleel pan Jahleel behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen Zebulun minamte hi a, mi tul sawmguk le zanga ahi uh hi.
Amau’ behbehin Josef minamte: Manasseh le Efraim ahi uh hi.
Manasseh minamte: Makhir pan Makhir behte ahi uh hi; Makhir pen Gilead’ pa ahi hi; Gilead pan Gilead behte ahi uh hi.
Gilead’ suante: Iezer pan Iezer behte ahi uh hi;
Asriel pan Asriel behte ahi uh hi; Shekhem pan Shekhem behte ahi uh hi;
Shemida pan Shemida behte ahi uh hi; Hefer pan Hefer behte ahi uh hi.
Tu-in Hefer’ tapa Zelofehad in tapa nei lo a, ahih hangin tanu nei hi: Zelofehad’ tanute’ minte in Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah le Tirzah ahi hi.
Hihte pen Manasseh minamte hi a, mi tul sawmnga le tulnih le zasagih ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Efraim minamte: Suthelah pan Suthelah behte ahi uh hi; Bekher pan Bekher behte ahi uh hi; Tahan pan Tahan behte ahi uh hi.
Suthelah minamte: Eran pan Eran behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen Efraim minamte hi a, mi tul sawmthum le tulnih le zanga ahi hi. Hihte pen amau’ behbehin Josef minamte ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Benjamin minamte: Bela pan Bela behte ahi uh hi; Ashbel pan Ashbel behte ahi uh hi; Ahiram pan Ahiram behte ahi uh hi;
Shefufam pan Shefufam behte ahi uh hi; Hufam pan Hufam behte ahi uh hi.
Bela’ tapate pen Ard le Naaman ahi uh hi: Ard pan Ard behte ahi uh hi; Naaman pan Naaman behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen amau’ behbehin Benjamin minamte hi a, mi tul sawmli le tulnga le zaguk ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Dan minamte: Shuham pan Shuham behte hi a, hihte pen Dan minamte ahi uh hi.
Dan minam sung pan Shuham behte mi tul sawmguk le tulli le za li ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Asher minamte: Imnah pan Imnah behte ahi uh hi; Ishvi pan Ishvi behte ahi uh hi; Beriah pan Beriah behte ahi uh hi.
Beriah minamte: Heber pan Heber behte ahi uh hi; Malkhiel pan Malkhiel behte ahi uh hi.
Asher’ tanu’ min Serah ahi hi.
Hihte pen Asher minamte hi a, tul sawmnga le tulthum le zali ahi hi.
Amau’ behbehin Naftali minamte: Jahzeel pan Jahzeel behte ahi uh hi; Guni pan Guni behte ahi uh hi;
Jezer pan Jezer behte ahi uh hi; Shillem pan Shillem behte ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen Naftali minamte hi a, mi tul sawmli le tulnga le za li ahi hi.
Hihte pen Israel mi vekpi a phazah hi a, mi tul zaguk le tul khat le zasagih le sawmthum ahi uh hi.
“Mi a phazah tawh kizui-in hih mite tungah luah dingin leitang kihawm ding hi.
Minam a tamte tungah gamh a tam na pia dinga, minam a tawmte tungah gamh a tawm na pia ding hi. Minam khempeuh a mi phazah tawh kizui-in gamh kipia ding hi.
Ahih hangin leitang pen aisanna tawh kihawm dinga, amau’ beh min tawh kizui-in amaute in luah ding uh hi.
Aisanna tawh kizui-in a tamte tungah a tam, a tawmte tungah a tawm, a gamh uh kihawmsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amau’ behbehin a kisim Levi minamte: Gershon pan Gershon behte ahi uh hi; Kohath pan Kohath behte ahi uh hi; Merari pan Merari behte ahi uh hi.
Amau’ suante: Libni behte, Hebron behte, Mahli behte, Mushi behte le Korah behte ahi uh hi. Kohath pen Aram’ pa ahi hi.
Amram’ zi pen Levi sung pan Egypt gamah a suak ahi Levi’ tanu Jokhebed ahi hi. Tua nu in Amram tawh Aaron, Moses le a sanggamnu uh Miriam nei hi.
Aaron in ta Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar nei hi.
Ahih hangin Nadab le Abihu pen amaute in

Pasal peuhmah kha khat pan a tungsiah, amau’ sung pan a kisimte, tul sawmnih le tulthum ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite lakah amaute gamh kipia lo ahih manin Israel mite lakah amaute kisimkhawm lo hi.
Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab zanglei-ah Israel mite a sim Moses le siampi Eleazar mah in a sim mite pen hihte ahi uh hi.
Ahih hangin Sinai sehnel gamah Israel mite a sim Moses le Aaron in a simte lakah tu-in khat zong kihel nawn lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh

Tua ciangin Josef’ tapate sung panin Manasseh’ tapa Makhir, Makhir’ tapa Gilead, Gilead’ tapa Hefer, Hefer’ tapa Zelofehad’ tanute a nai-ah hong pai uh hi. Ama tanute’ minte in: Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milkah le Tirzah ahi hi.
Amaute, Moses’ mai le siampi Eleazar’ mai le makaite’ mai le mihonte khempeuh’ mai, kikhopna bukkongah ding uh a,
“Ka pa uh gamlakah a si hi. Korah tawh kipawlinTopalangpangin a kikaikhawm mihonte lakah amah kihel lo hi. Ahih hangin ama khialhna hangin si a, amah in tapa nei lo hi.Topa
Amah in tapa a neih loh man bekin bang hangin a beh sung panin ka pa uh’ min mangthang ding ahi hiam? Ka pa uh sanggamte’ lakah kote zong neihsa hong pia un,” a ci uh hi.
Moses inTopa’mai-ah amau’ thu a gen hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Zelofehad’ tanute’ thugen man hi. Amau’ pa’ sanggamte lakah neihsa gamh amaute tungah na pia dinga, amau’ pa’ gamh amaute’ tungah na tungsak ding hi.
Israel mite tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: ‘Pasal khat si-in, tapa a neih kei leh, ama gamh a tanu na luahsak ding uh hi.
Amah in tanu a neih kei leh, ama gamh a sanggam pasalte tungah na tungsak ding uh hi.
Amah in sanggam pasal a neih kei leh, ama gamh ama pa’ sanggam pasalte tungah na pia ding uh hi.

Ama pa in sanggam pasal a neih kei leh, ama gamh ama innkuan tawh a kinai ama behpa’ tungah na pia ding uh a, amah in tang ding hi.Topain Moses a thupiak bangin hih pen Israel mite tungah thukham le ngeina kip hi ding hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah, “Hih Abarim mual tungah paito inla, Israel mite’ tungah ka piak leitang en in.Topa
Na muh khit ciangin na sanggampa Aaron mah bangin nang zong na mite kiang na zuan ta ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh,
mihonpite a kitot lai-un tui phualah keimah sianthosak ding hunin Zin gamlakah keima thu nong lehpan hi,” a ci hi. (Hihte pen Zin gamlak, Kadesh gam Meribah tui a thupiangte a cihna ahi hi.)
Moses inTopakiangah,Topa

“Topa’ mihonte, a cing nei lo tuute a bat loh nadingin amaute’ mai-ah pai khia-in amaute’ mai-ah a tum ding, amaute pai khiatpihin amaute a ciahpih ding, mihonte a uk dingin,Topa, mi khempeuh tungah nuntakna a pia Pasian ahi nangmah in mi khat seh in,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah, “Nun’ tapa Joshua, siamna a nei mipa la inla, ama tungah na khut nga in.Topa
Siampi Eleazar le mihon khempeuh mai-ah amah na dingsak dinga, amaute’ muhna-ah amah za na pia ding hi.
Israel mihon khempeuh in ama thu a man theih nadingin thuneihna pawlkhat amah na guan ding hi.

Siampi Eleazar’ mai-ah amah ding dinga, amah inTopa’mai-ah Urim thukhenna tawh thu dotsak ding hi. Amah le amah tawh a om Israel mi khempeuh, mihon buppi, ama thu tawh pusuak ding uh a, ama thu mah tawh sungtum ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain amah a thupiak bangin Moses gamta a, amah in Joshua la-in siampi Eleazar le mihon buppi mai-ah dingsak a,Topa
amah in ama tungah a khutte nga-in,Topain ama tungah a gen bangin Joshua tungah za a pia hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite thu pia-in amaute tungah, ‘Keimah hong kibiakna mei tawh a kihal an, a gim namtui keima-a’ pen a hunin kei tungah nong piak ding uh phawk un,’ ci-in gen in.
“Topa’tungah na piak ding uh mei tawh kihal biakna in: A sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno nih, tatsat loin biakpiakna-in nisimin na pia ding uh hi.Topa’
Tuuno khat zingsangin na pia ding uh a, a tuuno khat pen nitakin na pia ding uh hi.
An tawh biakna-in oliv thau hai khat tawh a kibawl annel lawh khat na pia ding uh hi.
Tua penTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, a gim namtui dingin Sinai Mual-ah a kikipsak, a kitatsat lo meihal biakna ahi hi.Topa’
Leenggahzu tawh biakna pen tuuno khat ciangin hai khat hi ding hi.Topa’tungah leenggah-zucil tawh biakna pen siangtho munah na sung ding uh hi.Topa’
A tuuno khat nitakin na pia ding uh hi. Zingsang a an tawh biakna le a leenggahzu tawh biakna mah bangin, mei tawh kihal biakna,Topa’tungah a gim namtui-in na pia ding uh hi.Topa’
“Sabbath ni-in a sitbaang lo, kum khat a pha tuuno nih le an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh nih le a leenggahzu tawh biakna hi ding hi.
Hih pen tatsat loin meihal biakna le a leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah Sabbath simin meihal biakna ahi hi.
“Kha simin a ni masa ni-inTopa’tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi. Bawngtal nih, tuutal khat, a sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih hi ding hi.Topa’
Bawngtal khat ciangin an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh thum zong hi ding hi. A tuutal khat ciangin an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh nih hi ding hi.
Tuuno khat adingin an tawh biakna-in sathau tawh a kibawl annel lawh khat ciat hi dinga, a gim namtui meihal biak nading ahi hi.

Leenggahzu tawh biaknate pen, bawngtal khat ciangin leenggahzu thawl lang, tuutal khat ciangin leenggahzu hai nih, tuuno khat ciangin leenggahzu hai khat hi ding hi. Hihte pen kum khat sunga om kha simin meihal biakna ahi hi.
Khialhna hanga biakna-inTopa’tungah keel a pa khat zong kipia ding hi. Tua pen a kitatsat loin meihal biakna le a leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah a kipia ding ahi hi.Topa’
“Kha masa a ni sawm le ni li ni penTopa’Paisan Pawi ni ahi hi.Topa’
Tua kha a ni sawm le ni nga ni pen biakna pawi ni hi a, ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum kine ding hi.
A ni masa ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat om ding hi. Tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a,
Topa’tungah meihal biakna na pia ding uh hi. Tuate pen bawngtalno nih, tuutal khat le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih hi ding hi. Tuate a sitbaang lo ahih ding thei un.Topa’
Sathau tawh a kibawl annel ahi an tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi. Bawngtal khat ciangin annel lawh thum le tuutal khat ciangin annel lawh nih tawh na pia khawm ding uh hi.
Tuuno sagihte khat ciangin annel lawh khat mah tawh na pia khawm ding uh hi.
Note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
Meihal biak nading ahi zingsang a meihal biakna banah tatsat lo-a biakna-in hihte na pia ding uh hi.

Tua bangmahin mei tawh kihal an tawh biakna ahi,Topa’tungah a gim namtui, ni sagih sung ni simin na pia ding uh hi. Tua pen a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah kipia ding hi.Topa’
A ni sagih ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.
“Na nipikal pawi hununTopa’tungah an thak tawh biakna na piak hun uh anpal piak ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh hi. Tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a,Topa’
meihal biakna,Topa’tungah a gim namtui na pia ding uh hi. Bawngtalno nih, tuutal khat le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo hi ding hi.Topa’
Sathau tawh a kibawl ahi an tawh a biak nadingin zong, bawngtal khat ciangin annel lawh thum, tuutal khat ciangin lawh nih,
tuuno sagihte khat ciangin lawh khat tawh na pia khawm ding uh hi.
Note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin keel a pa khat zong na pia ding uh hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biaknate banah tuate le leenggahzu tawh biakna na pia ding uh hi. Tuate a sitbaang lo ahih ding thei ta un.
“A kha sagihna a ni masa ni-in kikhopna siangtho khat na nei ding uh a, tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua ni pen note in peengkul na tum ni ding uh hi a,
meihal biakna,Topa’tungah a gim namtui na piak dingte un: Bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo hi ding hi.Topa’
Bawngtal tawh piak dingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel ahi an tawh biaknate lawh thum, tuutal tawh lawh nih,
le tuuno sagihte khat ciangin lawh khat hi ding hi.
Note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.

A khasim meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le tuate ading ngeina a om bangin a gim namtui,Topa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ahi leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah hi ding hi.Topa’
“Hih kha sagihna a ni sawm ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, an tangin tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi.
Topa’tungah a gim namtui meihal biakna na piak dingte un: Bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih hi dinga, tuate pen note’ muhna-ah a sitbaang lo hi ding hi.Topa’
Sathau tawh a kibawl annel tawh biaknate pen, bawngtal tawh piak khawm dingin lawh thum, a tuutal tawh lawh nih,
tuuno sagihte khat ciangin lawh khat hi ding hi.
Kilem nadingin khialhna hanga biakna le a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A kha sagihna ni sawm le ni nga ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat nei-in tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a,Topaadingin ni sagih sung pawi na kham ding uh hi.Topa

A ni masa ni-in meihal biakna,Topa’tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biak nadingin bawngtalno sawm le thum, tuutal nih, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li na pia ding uh a, tuate a sitbaang lo hi ding hi.Topa’
Sathau tawh a kibawl annel ahi an tawh biaknate pen, bawngtal sawm le thumte khat ciangin lawh thum, tuutal nihte khat ciangin lawh nih,
le tuuno sawm le lite khat ciangin lawh khat hi ding hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni nih ni-in bawngtalno sawm le nih, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni thum ni-in bawngtal sawm le khat, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak bangin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni li ni-in bawngtal sawm, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
ngeina om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni nga ni-in bawngtal kua, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni guk ni-in bawngtal giat, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni sagih ni-in bawngtal sagih, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
“A ni giat ni-in a thupikikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.
Meihal biakna, mei tawh kihal biakna,Topa’tungah a gim namtui na piak dingte un: Bawngtal khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,Topa’
ngeina kip om bangin bawngtal, tuutal le tuunote a phazah tawh kizui-in piakkhawm dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.

“Na thuciam biakpiakna uh le utthu-a na biakpiaknate uh banah na meihal biaknate le an tawh na biaknate le leenggahzu tawh na biaknate le thunuama na biak nadingun a kiseh na pawi hunte uhah hihte,Topa’tungah na pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses a thupiak bangin amah in Israel mite tungah a thu a kimin a gensawn hi.Topa
Moses in Israel minam lutangte tungah, “Topa’thupiak hih bang ahi hi:Topa’

Mi khat inTopa’tungah thuciamna a ciam ciang ahi a, amah in a zuih dingin kiciamna a bawl ciang ahi zongin, amah ciampel lo dinga, ama kamsung panin a ging khiate khempeuh tawh kizui-in gamta ding hi.Topa’
“Tua ahih kei leh, numei khat inTopa’tungah thuciamna bawlin, a pa’ inn sungah nungakin a om sungin kamciamna tawh amah kikhihtawm a,Topa’
amah in a zuih dingin thuciamna le kamciamnate a bawlna a pa in za napi-in ama tungah bangmah a cih kei leh, ama thuciamna khempeuh kip dinga, amah a kikhih tawmna kamciamna khempeuh kip ding hi.

Ahih hangin a pa in a zak ni-in a lungkim lohna a tanu’ tungah a gen leh, tua nu’ thuciamna, amah a kikhih tawmna kamciamnate khat zong kip lo ding hi. A pa in nial ahih maninTopain tua nu maisak ding hi.Topa
“Tua numei, pasal khat tawh kiteeng a, amah a kikhih tawmna thuciamna ahi a, ngaihsun lopi-in a kampaunate ahi zongin
a pasal in za a, a zak ni-in a zi’ tungah bangmah a cih kei leh tua numei’ thuciamna kip dinga, amah a kikhih tawmna a kamciam kip ding hi.

Ahih hangin, a pasal in tua thu a zak ni-in a lungkim lohna a gen leh, amah a kikhih tawmna ahi numei’ tunga om kamciamna le ngaihsun lopi-in a kampaunate amah in phiatsak dinga,Topain tua nu maisak ding hi.Topa
“Ahih hangin meigong numei’ thuciamna ahi a, a kima numei’ thuciamna ahi zongin, amah a kikhih tawmna peuhmah ama tungah kip ding hi.
“Numei khat in a pasal’ inn sungah thu a ciam ahi a, kiciamna khat tawh kamciamin amah a kikhih tawmna ahi zongin,
a pasal in za a, a zi’ tungah bangmah ci loin, a nial kei leh, ama thuciamna khempeuh kip dinga, amah a kikhih tawmna thuciamna khempeuh zong kip ding hi.

Ahih hangin a pasal in tua thute a zak ni-in a phiatsak leh, ama thuciamna tawh kisai-in a kam panin a ging khia peuhmah ahi a, a mahmah a kamciamna tawh kisaite ahi zongin kip lo ding hi. A pasal in tuate phiatsak ahih maninTopain tua nu maisak ding hi.Topa
Thuciamna khatpeuh ahi a, an tang dingin a kikhihna kamciam khatpeuh ahi zongin, a pasal in kipsak thei, a pasal in phiatsak thei hi.

Ahih hangin a pasal in tua a kiciam ni a kipanin a zi’ tungah bangmah a cih kei leh, amah in a zi’ tunga om thuciamna khempeuh hitaleh a kamciam khempeuh hitaleh a kipsak ahi hi. Amah in tuate a zak ni-in ama tungah bangmah ci lo ahih manin tuate a kipsak ahi hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tuate a zak khit ciangin a nung phiat leh, amah in a zi’ mawhna pua ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte pen, pasal le a zi le a pa’ inn sungah nungakin a om laitakin a pa le a tanu’ kikalah a om,Topain Moses a piak ngeinate ahi hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite’ phu Midian-te tungah la in. Tua khit ciangin na mipihte kiang na zuan ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in mite kiangah, “Midian-te’ tungahTopa’phulakna a sem ding, Midian-te a do dingin note’ lak panin mi pawlkhat galhiam guan un.Topa’
Israel minamte nam khat panin mi tulkhat ciat gal sungah na kuansak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mi tul tampi sung panin minam khatah tulkhat, tul sawm le tulnih galdo dingin galhiam kiguan hi.
Moses in amaute, minam khat panin tulkhat ciat, biakinn nate le pataukoh nadingin peengkulte siampi Eleazar’ tapa Finehas kengsakin ama makaihna tawh gal sungah a kuansak hi.
Topain Moses a thupiak bangin Midian-te do uh a, pasal khempeuh that uh hi.Topa
Amaute in midangte le Midian kumpi ngate Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur le Reba a thahna uhah, Beor’ tapa Balaam zong namsau tawh that khawm uh hi.
Israel-te in Midian nupite le a tate uh manin, a bawngte, a tuuhonte khempeuh le a na khempeuh uh laksak uh hi.
Amau’ tenna a khuapi khempeuh uh le a giahphual khempeuh uh mei tawh halsak uh a,
a matsa khempeuh uh, mihing ganhing ciahpih khin uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Jerikho nai, Jordan kiang, Moab zanglei-a a giahphual uh a Moses le siampi Eleazar le Israel mihonte kiangah a galmatte uh le a na lakte uh tunpih uh hi.
Moses, siampi Eleazar le mihon makaite khempeuh zong giahphual pua-ah vai dawn dingin pai uh hi.
Galdona panin a hong ciah mi tul tampi a ukte le mi za tampi a uk galkap uliante’ tungah Moses heh hi.
Moses in amaute tungah, “Numei khempeuh hingkhawi na hi uh hiam?
En un, hih mite in Balaam’ lamlahna tawh Peor-ahTopa’tungah Israel mite zuautatsak hi. Tua ahih maninTopa’mihonte lakah gimna hong tung hi.Topa’Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, a khangnote lakah pasal peuhmah that unla, pasal tawh a lumkhawmsa numei peuhmah zong that un.
Ahih hangin pasal tawh a lumkhawm nai lo nungaknote khempeuh note adingin kem un.
Tu-in note lakah mi khat peuhpeuh a thatte le a kithatsa a lawng mi peuhmahte, giahphual pua-ah ni sagih sung om un. A ni thum ni le a ni sagih ni-in note le na galmatte uh na kisiansuah ding uh hi.
Puan khempeuh, savun tawh a kibawl na khempeuh, keel mul tawh a kibawl na khempeuh le sing tawh a kibawl na khempeuh na siansuah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Siampi Eleazar in galdona-ah a va kuan galkapte tungah, “Topain Moses a thupiak thukham ngeina hih bang ahi hi:Topa
Kham, ngun, sumngo, sik, dal le haknaw,
mei a do zo peuhmahte bek mei-ah na hal ding uh a, a siang hi ding hi. Ahi zongin mei a do zo lo peuhmahte, nitna siansuahna tui tawh kisiansuah dinga, tui-ah na sawp ding uh hi.
A ni sagih ni-in na puante uh na sawp ding uh a, note a siangtho na hi ding uh hi. Tua khit ciangin giahphual ah nong ciahkik thei pan ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Nang le siampi Eleazar le mihon beh lutangte in gal sunga a kiman mihing le ganhingte sim un.
Gal sunga a kingahte khen nih suah inla, galdo dingin a kuan galhangte le inn-a om mihonte tungah a kikimin hawmsak in.
Galdo dingin a kuan khia galkapte’ tung panin mite, bawngtalte, late le tuuhonte zanga cianginTopa’siah dingin khat ciat la in.Topa’
Alang a ngah uh sung panin la inla,Topa’tungah biakna-in siampi Eleazar tungah pia in.Topa’
Israel mihonte in alang a ngah uh sung panin mite, bawngtalte, late, tuuhonte, ganhing khempeuh, sawmnga ciangin khat ciat la inla,Topa’biakbuk a kem Levi mite tungah pia in,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses a thupiak bangin Moses le siampi Eleazar in a sem uh hi.Topa
Tu-in galkapte in a lak gal sunga a mat uh a omlai a kihawm dingte: Tuu tul zaguk le tul sawmsagih le tulnga,
bawng tul sawmsagih le tulnih,
la tul sawmguk le tulkhat,
le pasal tawh a lumkhawm nai lo nungak a vekpi-in tul sawmthum le tulnih ahi hi.
Alang ahi, gal sungah a kuan khia mite’ ngah pen tuu tul zathum le tul sawmthum le tulsagih le zanga hi a,
Topa’tuusiah pen tuu zaguk le sawmsagih le nga ahi hi.Topa’
Bawngte tul sawmthum le tulguk hi a,Topa’siah sawmsagih le nih ahi hi.Topa’
Late tul sawmthum le zanga hi a, tua sung paninTopa’siah sawmguk le khat ahi hi.Topa’
Nungak tul sawm le tulguk hi a, tua sung paninTopa’siah nungak sawmthum le nih ahi hi.Topa’
Topain Moses a thupiak bangin Moses in siampi Eleazar’ tungahTopabiak nading siah a pia hi.TopaTopa
Galdo dingin a kuan khia mite adingin Moses in a khenkhiat zah mah Israel mihonte in ngah uh a,
mihonte in a ngah alang teng pen tuu tul zathum le tul sawmthum le tulsagih le zanga,
bawng tul sawmthum le tulguk,
la tul sawmthum le zanga,
nungak tul sawm le tulguk ahi hi.
Israel-te in a ngah alang sung panin Moses in mihing le ganhing sawmnga ciangin khat ciat la-in,Topain ama tungah a thupiak banginTopa’biakbuk a kem Levi mite tungah a pia hi.TopaTopa’
Tua ciangin galkap tul tampite tunga uliante ahi, tul tampi a ukte le za tampi a ukte, Moses kiangah hong pai uh a,
“Kote’ ukna nuai-a a om galkapte, na nasem kote in ka sim khin uh a, kote’ kiang panin mi khat zong a pelhem om lo hi.

Kote inTopa’mai-ah ko adingin kilemna bawl nading,Topabiak nadingin kham tawh a kibawl nate, banbuhte le taaute, min gelhna zungbuhte, bilbahte le khite ka muh ciat uh kong puak uh hi,” hong ci uh hi.Topa’Topa
Moses le siampi Eleazar in amaute’ tung panin na-a a kibawl khamte a sang uh hi.
Tul tampi a ukte le za tampi a ukte’ tung panin a kingah,Topa’tungah biakna-in a piak uh khamte khempeuh shekel tul sawm le tulguk le zasagih le sawmnga a gik hi.Topa’
(Gal sunga a kuan mite in amau ading ciat a la uh hi.)
Moses le siampi Eleazar in tul tampi le za tampi a uk mite’ tung panin khamte sang uh a, Israel mite adinginTopa’mai-ah phawk tawntungna-in kikhopna buk sungah a koih uh hi.Topa’
Reuben minamte le Gad minamte in ganhing hon tampi nei uh hi. Amaute in Jazer gam le Gilead gam a muh uh ciangin gan khawi nading munin hoihsa mahmah uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gad minamte le Reuben minamte pai-in Moses le siampi Eleazar le mihon makaite kiangah,
“Ataroth, Dibon, Jazer, Nimrah, Heshbon, Elealeh, Sebam, Nebo le Beon
Topain Israel mihonte a hong luahsak gamte pen a gan gam hi a, na nasem kote in gan ka nei uh hi.Topa
Nong hehpihna-un hih gam hong pia unla, Jordan kantanin kote hong paipih kei un,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in Gad minamte le Reuben minamte tungah, “Note hih laitakah om hithiatin na sanggamte uh gal sungah kuan ding ahi hiam?
Topain amaute a piakna gamah a pai nading uhah Israel mite bang hangin lungkiasak ding na hi uh hiam?Topa
Na pu na pate uh Kadeshbarnea panin gam vel dingin ka sawl lai-in zong tu-a mah a bang uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute Eshkol Kuam-ah paito-in tua gam a muh uh ciangin,Topain amaute a piakna gamah a pai nading uhah Israel mite lungkiasak uh hi.Topa
Tua huninTopaheh mahmah ahih manin amah kiciamin,Topa

‘Amaute in kei hong zui taktak lo uh ahih manin Egypt gam pan a pai khia mite kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah peuhmah khat beek in, Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tungah piak dingin ka ciamsa gam mu lo ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin Kenaz mi Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb le Nun’ tapa Joshua inTopazui taktak uh ahih manin a mu ding uh hi,’ ci hi.Topa
Israel mite tungahTopaheh a, ama muhna-ah siatna a gamta tua khangmi khempeuh a bei mateng kum sawmli sung gamlakah amaute vak kawikawisak hi.Topa
En un, Israel mite tungahTopa’hehluatna a khangsakto lai dingin, na pu na pate uh’ tangin hong khang na hi uh hiam!Topa’
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah zuihna panin note na pial uhleh amah in gamlakah amaute nusiakik dinga, note pen hih mi khempeuh a susia na hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiang nai-ah amaute hong pai-in, “Hih lai-ah ka tuute uh adingin tuukhawkte bawlin, ka zi ka tate uh adingin khua ka sat ding uh a,

ahih hangin kote in hiam tawi-in amau’ munah Israel mite ka tunpih mateng uh amau’ mai-ah a pai dingin ka kiging ding uh hi. Tua kikal sungin hih gam sungah a teeng mite’ kiang pan kihut nadingin khuapi muanhuai sungah ka zi ka tate uh a na om ding uh kisam hi.
Israel mite in amau’ luah ding ciat a luah khit matengun ka inn uhah ka ciah kei ding uh hi.
Jordan galkhat le tua ban siahah amaute tawh ka luah khawm kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Jordan hih lamgal nisuahna lam kote’ luah hong suak hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in amaute kiangah, “Note, tu-a bangin gamta-in, galdo dinginTopa’mai-ah a pai dingin hiam la-in,Topa’
Topain a mai panin a galte a hawl khiat matengin hiam a tawi note khempeuh in ama mai-ah Jordan kantanin,Topa

Topa’mai-ah leitang a kilak matengin na om uhleh,Topale Israel mite ading na sep ding teng uh a zo khin na hih manun note na ciahkik ding uh a, hih leitang penTopa’mai-ah note’ neihsa hi ding hi.Topa’TopaTopa’
Ahih hangin note tua bangin na gamtat kei uhleh, en un,Topa’tungah a khial khin na hi uh hi. Na khialhna un note hong sulzuih ding theitel un.Topa’
Na zi na tate uh adingin khuapite satin, na tuute uh adingin tuukhawkte bawl unla, na ciamsa bangun gamta un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Gad minamte le Reuben minamte in Moses kiangah, “Ka topa’ thupiak bangin na nasemte ka gamta ding uh hi.
Ka tate uh, ka zite uh, ka tuuhonte uh le ka ganhing khempeuhte uh Gilead gam khuapite-ah na om ding uh hi.
Kote’ topa in nong thupiak bangin na nasemte, galdo dingin hiam a tawi thei khempeuh, galdo dinginTopa’mai-ah ka galkah ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in amaute’ thu tawh kisai-in siampi Eleazar’ tung le Israel minam beh lutang khempeuh tungah thu a pia hi.

Moses in amaute tungah, “Gad minamte le Reuben minamte,Topa’mai-ah galdo dingin hiam a tawi thei khempeuh in note tawh Jordan kantanin tua gam hong zawhpih leh, Gilead gam a neih dingun amaute tungah na pia ding uh hi.Topa’
Ahih hangin hiam tawi-in note tawh hong galkah kei uhleh zong amaute in Kanaan gam sungah note mah bangin ngah nei veve ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Gad minamte le Reuben minamte in dawng uh a, “Topa aw,Topa’thupiak bangin kote ka gamta ding uh hi.Topa’
Hiam tawi-inTopa’mai-ah Kanaan gam sungah ka pai ding uh a, kote’ luah ahi ka neihsa uh Jordan galkhat ah kote a’ mahin na kip ding hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa’

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Gad minamte, Reuben minamte le Josef’ tapa Manasseh minam alangte tungah, Amor kumpi Sihon’ gam le Bashan kumpi Og’ gam, a leitang le a khuapite a gam sung tawh, a gam sunga leitang tunga om khuapi khempeuh a pia hi.
Gad minamte in khuapi muanhuai Dibon, Ataroth, Aroer,
Atrothshofan, Jazer, Jogbehah,
Bethnimrah le Bethharan-te satin, tuute adingin tuukhawkte a bawl uh hi.
Reuben minamte in Heshbon, Elealeh, Kiriathaim,
Nebo, Baalmeon (a minte kheel ding) le Sibmah khuapite sat uh a, amau’ satsa khuapite’ min a thak a phuak uh hi.
Manasseh’ tapa Makhir-te beh, Gilead-ah pai-in va la uh a, tua sunga om Amor mite suan khia uh hi.
Moses in Manasseh’ tapa Makhir-te beh tungah Gilead pia a, tua lai-ah amaute a teeng uh hi.
Manasseh minam sung panin Jair pai-in amau’ khuaneute va la a, tuate Havvothjair, ci-in min a phuak hi.
Nobah pai-in Kenath le a khuaneute va la a, ama min tamin Nobah a phuak hi.
Hihte pen Moses le Aaron’ makaihna tawh Egypt gam panin a honin a pai khiat lai-un Israel mite’ giahphualte ahi hi.
Moses inTopa’thupiakna tawh phual khat khit phual khat amau’ kipatna munte a gelh hi. Hihte pen amau’ kipatna mun tawh kizui-in a giahphualte ahi hi.Topa’
A kha masa, tua kha ni sawm le ni nga ni-in Rameses panin amaute ding khia uh hi. Paisan Pawi masa ni khit a zing ciangin Egypt mite khempeuh’ muhna-ah gualzawhna tawh Israel mite pai khia uh a,
Topain amaute’ lakah a thahlup tacil khempeuh Egypt mite in a vui laitak uh ahi hi.Topain amau pasian-te zo gawp hi.TopaTopa
Tua ahih ciangin Rameses panin Israel mite ding khia uh a, Sukkoth-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Sukkoth panin ding khia uh a, a gam mong a om Etham-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Etham panin ding khia uh a, Baalzefon nisuahna lama om Pihahiroth lamah kiheikik uh a, Migdol mai-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Pihahiroth mai panin ding khia uh a, tuipi laizang kantanin sehnel gamah pai-in Etham gam sungah ni thum lam pai uh a, Marah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Marah panin ding khia uh a, Elim tung uh hi. Elim-ah cik tuikhuk sawm le nih le nisuh kung sawmsagih om a, amaute in tua lai-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Elim panin ding khia uh a, San Tuipi gei-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
San Tuipi panin ding khia uh a, Sin sehnel gamah giahphual sat uh hi.
Sin gam panin ding khia uh a, Dofkah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Dofkah panin ding khia uh a, Alush ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Alush panin ding khia uh a, mite’ dawn ding tui a om lohna Refidim-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Refidim panin ding khia uh a, Sinai sehnel gamah giahphual sat uh hi.
Sinai gam panin ding khia uh a, Kibrothhattaavah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Kibrothhattaavah panin ding khia uh a, Hazeroth-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Hazeroth panin ding khia uh a, Rithmah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Rithmah panin ding khia uh a, Rimmonperez-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Rimmonperez panin ding khia uh a, Libnah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Ribnah panin ding khia uh a, Rissah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Rissah panin ding khia uh a, Kehelathah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Kehelathah panin ding khia uh a, Shefer Mual-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Shefer Mual panin ding khia uh a, Haradah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Haradah panin ding khia uh a, Makheloth ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Makheloth panin ding khia uh a, Tahath-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Tahath panin ding khia uh a, Terah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Terah panin ding khia uh a, Mithkah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Mithkah panin ding khia uh a, Hashmonah ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Hashmonah panin ding khia uh a, Moseroth-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Moseroth panin ding khia uh a, Benejaakan-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Benejaakan panin ding khia uh a, Horhaggidgad-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Horhaggidgad panin ding khia uh a, Jotbathah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Jotbathah panin ding khia uh a, Ebronah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Ebronah panin ding khia uh a, Eziongeber-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Eziongeber panin ding khia uh a, (Kadesh ahi) Zin gamah giahphual sat uh hi.
Kadesh panin ding khia uh a, Edom gam mong Hor Mual-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Israel mite Egypt gam panin a pai khiat zawh uh a kum sawmlina, a kha ngana, a ni masa ni-inTopa’thupiakna tawh Hor Mual tungah siampi Aaron paito-in tua lai-ah a si hi.Topa’
Hor Mual-ah Aaron a sihin kum za le kum sawmnih le kum thum a pha hi.
Kanaan gam sung Negeb gamah a teeng Kanaan mi Arad kumpipa in Israel mite hong paina thu a za hi.
Hor Mual panin amaute ding khia uh a, Zalmonah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Zalmonah panin ding khia uh a, Punon-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Punon panin ding khia uh a, Oboth-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Oboth panin ding khia uh a, Moab gam sung Iyeabarim-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Iyim panin ding khia uh a, Dibongad-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Dibongad panin ding khia uh a, Almondiblathaim ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Almondiblathaim panin ding khia uh a, Nebo tun ma Abarim mualte ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Abarim mualte panin ding khia uh a, Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab zanglei-ah giahphual sat uh a,
Jordan kiang Bethjeshimoth panin Moab zanglei sunga om Abelshittim dongah amaute in giahphual a sat uh hi.
Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab zanglei-ahTopain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Jerikho kantanin Kanaan gam na tun uh ciangin

note’ mai panin tua gam a mi khempeuh na hawl khia ding uh a, amau’ suang milimte khempeuh susia-in, a kisung amau’ milimte khempeuh na susia ding uh a, mual tunga a biaknate khempeuh uh na su mang ding uh hi.
Na neih dingun note’ tungah leitang hong pia khin ka hih manin note in leitang luahin tua tungah na teeng ding uh hi.

Note in na minam uh tawh kizui-in aisanna tawh leitang na luah ding uh hi. Minam tamte tungah a tam na pia ding uh a, minam tawmte tungah a tawm na pia ding uh hi. Mi khatpeuh ading ai a phatna peuhpeuh ama a’ hi dinga, na pate uh nam tawh kizui-in na luah ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin note’ mai panin tua gam a teeng mite na hawl khiat kei uhleh, na omsak lai uh mite pen na mittang uh a hong do, na pang uh a hong sun lingte tawh hong kibang ding uh a, na tenna gam uhah note hong gimsak ding uh hi.
Amaute tunga hih dinga ka ngaihsut bangin note’ tungah kong hih ding hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
“Israel mite kiangah hih bangin gen in: Note tungah ka hong piak Kanaan gamah na lut uh ciangin
na leitaw lampang uh pen Zin gam panin Edom pang teng hi dinga, leitaw lam na gamgi uh nisuahna lamah Ci Tuipi mong pan kipan ding hi.
Na gamgi uh Akrabbim mual leitaw lamah kawi-in Zin dong banin, Kadeshbarnea leitaw lamah pai ding hi. Tua ciangin Hazaraddar lamah paisuakin Azmon dongah pai dinga,
Azmon panin Egypt Lui lamah kawi-in Tuipi-ah tawp ding hi.
“Nitumna gamgi dingin Tuipi Lian le a gei dung teng na nei ding uh hi; hih pen nitumna lam na gamgi uh hi ding hi.
“Leilu lam na gamgi ding uh pen Tuipi Lian panin Hor Mual dong na ciamteh ding uh hi.
Hor Mual panin Hamath tumna ciang dong na ciamteh ding uh a, gamgi in Zedad dong ban ding hi.
Tua ciangin Zifron dongah gamgi kikhung dinga, a mong pen Hazarenan-ah tawp ding hi; hih pen leilu lam na gamgi uh hi ding hi.
“Nisuahna lam na gamgi uh Hazarenan panin Shefam dong na ciamteh ding uh hi.
Gamgi pen Shefam panin Ain nisuahna lam Riblah dongah paisuk ding hi. Gamgi paisuk lai-in nisuahna lamah Khinnereth tuipi liangko dong ban ding hi.
Jordan dongah gamgi paisuk dinga, a mong pen Ci Tuipi-ah tawp ding hi. Hih pen a kimkota gamgi a nei na leitang uh hi ding hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Israel mite thu pia-in, “Hih pen minam kua le minam langte tungah piak dingin
Bang hang hiam cih leh Reuben minamte a behbeh le Gad minamte in a behbehin amau’ luah ding ngah khinzo uh a, Manasseh minam alangte in zong ngah khinzo uh hi.
Minam nih le minam langte in nisuahna lam, Jerikho nai Jordan galkhat ah amau’ luah ding ngah khinzo uh hi,” a ci hi.
“Luah dingin note’ tungah gam a hawm ding mite pen siampi Eleazar le Nun’ tapa Joshua ahi uh hi.
Luah dingin gam a hawm dingin minam simah makai khat na la ding hi.

Tua na lak ding mite:Judah minam sung panin Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb ahi hi.Simeon minam panin Ammihud’ tapa Shemuel ahi hi.Benjamin minam panin Khislon’ tapa Elidad ahi hi.Dan minam panin makai khat, Jogli’ tapa Bukki ahi hi.Josef’ tapate’ sung pan: Manasseh minam-ah makai khat, Efod’ tapa Hanniel ahi hi.Efraim minam-ah makai khat, Shiftan’ tapa Kemuel ahi hi.Zebulun minam sung pan makai khat, Parnak’ tapa Elizafan ahi hi.Issakhar minam sung pan makai khat, Azzan’ tapa Paltiel ahi hi.Asher minam sung pan makai khat, Shelomi’ tapa Ahihud ahi hi.Naftali minam sung pan makai khat, Ammihud’ tapa Pedahel ahi hi.
“Hihte pen Kanaan gamah Israel mite adingin gamh a hawm dingin
Jerikho nai Jordan kiang Moab zanglei-ahTopain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Amaute in amau’ neih a luah uh sung panin ten nadingin Levi mite tungah khuapite a piak dingun Israel mite thu pia in. Khuapi kiima lonona gamte Levi mite tungah na pia ding hi.
Khuapite pen amau’ tenna hi dinga, a lonona gamte pen amau’ bawngte le a inn ganhingte le a ganhing khempeuh uh ading ahi hi.
Levi mite tungah na piak ding uh khuapi lonona gamte pen khuapikulh panin a kimkot pi tul le zanga ciang ban ding hi.

Khuapi laizang panin na teh dinga, nisuahna lampang pi tulthum, leitaw lampang pi tulthum, nitumna lampang pi tulthum, leilu lampang pi tulthum hi dinga, a laizangah khuapi om ding hi. Hih pen amau’ khuapi lonona taanggam dingin a neih ding uh ahi hi.
Levi mite tungah na piak uh khuapite pen bukna khuapi gukte hi dinga, mi thatte tua lai-ah na taisak ding uh a, tuate’ banah khuapi sawmli le nih na pia thuah ding uh hi.
Levi mite tungah na piak ding uh khuapi vekpi sawmli le giat hi-in, a lonona gamte tawh hi ding hi.

Israel mite’ neihsa sung panin na piak ding khuapite pen minam tamte tung panin tam la-in, minam tawmte tung panin tawm na la ding hi. Amau’ luah gamh tawh a kizui-in Levi mite tungah a khuapite uh a piak ciat ding uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Jordan kantanin Kanaan gamah na tun uh ciangin,
sawm lopi-in mi khatpeuh a thatkha mi thatte a va tai theih nading, note adingin bukna khuapi dingin khuapite na teel ding uh hi.
Thu kikhen dingin mihonpi mai-ah a din ma-in mi thatte a sih loh nadingin tua khuapite pen phulapa’ kiang panin note adingin bukna hi ding hi.
Na piak uh tua khuapite, note’ bukna khuapi gukte hi ding hi.
Bukna khuapi dingin Jordan galkhat ah khuapi thum, Kanaan gamah khuapi thum na teel ding uh hi.
Sawm lopi-in mi khatpeuh a thatkhate a tai theih nadingin hih khuapi gukte pen Israel mite, khualmite le note’ lakah a peemte adingin bukna hi ding hi.
“Ahih hangin mi khat in na-a kizang sik khat tawh midang khat satin a sih leh, amah mi that hi a, tua mi that pa kithat ding hi.
Amah in mi a sih theih nading mah ahi a khutsunga om suang khat tawh a suk a, a sih leh, amah mi that hi a, tua mi that pa kithat ding hi.
Tua ahih kei leh, amah in mi a sih theih nading ahi a khutsunga om sing a kibawl hiam khat tawh amah a sat a, a sih leh, mi that hi a, tua mi that pa kithat ding hi.
A kinaipih pen khat in a phu la-in mi that pa that dinga, amah a tuahna peuhah that ding hi.
“Amah in muhdahna tawh sunin, ahih kei leh bukin a khawh-a a sih leh,
tua ahih kei leh galbawlna tawh a khutin tumin a sih leh, tua a tum pa kithat ding hi. Amah mi that hi a, a phulapa in a tuah ciangin tua mipa that ding hi.
“Ahih hangin galbawl lopi-in thakhatin amah sunin, ahih kei leh buk lopi-in na khatpeuh tawh amah khawhin,
ahih kei leh, amah pen ama gal hi lo, ama siat nading a zong hi lo napi-in, mi a sih theih nading suang khat zangin a muh lohpi-in amah in deng kha-in a sih leh,
tua mi that pa le a phulapa’ kikalah hih ngeina kipte tawh kizui-in mihonpi in khen ding hi.

A phulapa’ khut sung panin mihonpi in mi that pa hon khia-in, mihonpi in amah a va taina, bukna khuapi-ah amah puakkik dinga, sathau siangtho a kinilh siampi lianpen pa a sih matengin tua khua-ah a teeng ding hi.
Ahih hangin hun khat peuhpeuhah amah a taina bukna khuapi gamgi khengin a pai a,
a phulapa in ama bukna khuapi daihual pualamah amah mu-in, a phulapa in mi that pa a thah leh, tua a that pa mawh lo ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh siampi lianpen pa a sih matengin tua mipa a bukna khuapi sungah a om ding ahi hi. Ahih hangin siampi lianpen pa a sih khit ciangin mi that pa a neihsa leitangah ciahkik thei ding hi.
“Hihte pen na tenna khempeuh uhah na khang tawntungun thukham le ngeina hi ding hi.
Khatpeuh in mi khat a thah leh, tecite’ genna siksanin mi that pa kithat ding hi. Ahih hangin teci khat bek’ teci panna siksanin kuamah kithat lo ding hi.
Tua tham loin, sihna thuak dingin a kilawm mipa tat nading sum na sang kei ding uh hi; amah kithat ding hi.
Siampi lianpen pa a sih ma-in bukna khuapi-ah a taisa mipa a gamah a ciahkik theih nadingin ama nuntakna tat nading sum na sang kei ding uh hi.
Na tenna uh leitang na ninsak kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi thahna in leitang ninsak a, a that mipa a kithah kei buang leh, tua mi kithahna leitang siansak nading thudang om thei lo hi.
A laizangah keimah ka tenna leitang na ninsak kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih lehTopakeimah, Israel mite’ laizangah ka teeng hi, ci hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.Topa
Josef’ tapate beh Manasseh, Manasseh’ tapa Makhir, Makhir’ tapa Gilead, Gilead’ tapa beh lutangte in hong naihin Moses le Israel mite beh lutang ahi makaite’ mai-ah thu gen uh a,

“Israel mite tungah aisanna tawh gamhluah dingin leitang piak dingTopain ka topa tungah thu hong pia hi. Ka sanggampa uh Zelofehad’ gamhluahte a tanute tungah piak dinginTopain ka topa tungah thu hong pia hi.TopaTopa

Ahih hangin Israel sungah minam dangte’ tapate khat peuhpeuh tawh amaute kiteeng leh ka pate uh’ gamhluah panin amau a’ teng kilakhia-in a manawh minamte tungah tua gamh kipia beh ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin ko’ ngahsa gamh a kikhen khia ding ahi hi.
Israel mite’ Jubilee hong tun ciangin amau a’ te pen a manawh minamte’ tungah kipia beh ding hi. Ka pa uh namte’ gamhluah panin amau a’ kikhen khia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses inTopa’genna tawh kizui-in Israel mite thu pia a, “Zelofehad minamte’ genna man hi.Topa’
Zelofehad’ tanute tawh kisai-inTopa’thupiak hih bang ahi hi: ‘Amaute in hoih a sak pente uh tawh kiteeng uh hen. Ahih hangin amau’ behte bek teenpih thei ding uh hi.Topa’
Israel mite’ gamhte minam khat pan namdang khatah pai khia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mi khempeuh a minam gamhluah ciat uh tawh kip ding uh hi.
Israel mi khempeuh in a pate uh’ gamh a luah theih nadingun, Israel mite’ sung panin minam khat peuhpeuhah gamh a nei tanu khempeuh pen a pate’ nam sung khat peuhpeuh’ zi hi ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin minam khat pan adang ah gamh pai khia lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite’ sung panin minam khempeuh amau’ gamh ciat tawh kip ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
